word: THE TWO LARGE PUBLISHING HOUSE FIRES WERE JUDGMENTS SENT BECAUSE OF THE SECULARIZATION OF THE REVIEW AND THE PACIFIC PRESS BY THE OVERPRODUCTION OF COMMERCIAL PRINTING, TO SAY NOTHING OF THE LARGE AMOUNT OF OBJECTIONABLE LITERATURE PUBLISHED. THUS, THE PRINTING DENOMINATIONAL LITERATURE WAS MADE SECONDARY AND SPIRITUAL INFLUENCES AND POWER WANED. GOD AND HIS GREAT WORK IN THE EARTH HAD TO WAIT WHILE WORLDLY BUSINESS INTERESTS WERE PUT FIRST.
